article_node.title: Qué significa gulag
article_node.summary: The article discusses the word 'gulag,' which refers to a system of Russian labor camps for political prisoners in the 20th century. It highlights its usage in various New York Times articles, including a piece about actor Jon Bernthal's experiences in Moscow. The text encourages readers to creatively use the word in sentences and provides resources for vocabulary enhancement.
